title: Dumbbell Squat Thrusters / Squat to Overhead Press
description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart with dumbbells above your shoulders. Squat down keeping your back flat and your knees over your toes. Push through your heels to return to standing while pressing the dumbbells overhead with arms fully extended. Return to starting position and repeat.
pose_description: Compound movement combining squat depth with overhead press for full-body power development
alignment_cues: Keep dumbbells racked on shoulders during squat portion
Press overhead as you drive up from squat
Full lockout at top with arms straight
benefits: Builds total body strength and power
Develops coordination between upper and lower body
Increases metabolic demand for fat loss
related_exercises: Lunging / Lunge with Bicep Hammer Curls
